statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 5 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 5 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ 7 \\ 5 \\ 7 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -5 \\ -7 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 5 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 5 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ 7 \\ 5 \\ 7 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -5 \\ -7 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
